Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains frequently-used static methods throughout the program.

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomFont

        public static javafx.scene.text.Font getCustomFont(java.io.File f,
                                                   int size)
        Loads a custom font via a FileInputStream. The font size is also specified.
        Parameters:
        f - The file of the font.
        size - The size of the font to create.
        Returns:
        The created Font instance.

      • getImage

        public static javafx.scene.image.Image getImage(java.io.File f,
                                                int requestedWidth,
                                                int requestedHeight,
                                                boolean preserveRatio,
                                                boolean smooth)
        Creates an image via a FileInputStream. Other parameters to construct the image are copied from the Image class constructor. The purpose of this method is to eliminate adding excessive exception throwing on class methods.
        Parameters:
        f - The file of the image.
        requestedWidth - The image's bounding box width.
        requestedHeight - The image's bounding box height.
        preserveRatio - Indicates whether to preserve the aspect ratio of the original image when scaling to fit the image within the specified bounding box.
        smooth - Indicates whether to use a better quality filtering algorithm or a faster one when scaling this image to fit within the specified bounding box.
        Returns:
        The created Image instance.
